Sentencas: Dense coatings on metallic interconnectors are necessary to suppress chromium poisoning of SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Atmospherically plasma sprayed (APS) Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 (MCF) protective layers demonstrated reduced chromium related degradation in laboratory and stack tests.
Titulo: Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Previous analyses revealed strong microstructural changes comparing the coating's as-sprayed and operated condition.
Titulo: Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This work concentrates on the layer-densification and crack-healing observed by annealing APS-MCF in air, which simulates the cathode operation conditions.
Titulo: Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effect is described by a volume expansion induced by a phase transformation.
Titulo: Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Reducing conditions during the spray process lead to a deposition of the MCF in a metastable rock salt configuration.
Titulo: Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Annealing in air activates diffusion processes for a phase transformation to the low temperature stable spinel phase (T < 1050 degrees C).
Titulo: Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This transformation is connected to an oxygen incorporation which occurs at regions facing high oxygen partial pressures, as there are the sample surface, cracks and pore surfaces.
Titulo: Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Calculations reveal a volume expansion induced by the oxygen uptake which seals the cracks and densifies the coating.
Titulo: Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The process decelerates when the cracks are closed, as the gas route is blocked and further oxidation continues over solid state diffusion.
Titulo: Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The self healing abilities of metastable APS coatings could be interesting for other applications.
Titulo: Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells
Self-healing atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 protective interconnector coatings for solid oxide fuel cells
